source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Polite Hyuran Male-)I have come, <var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var>.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Höflicher Hyuran-)Da bin ich, <var 08 E905 ((Meisterin)) ((Meister)) /var>.

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Rough Hyuran Male-)Nothin' fer ye to worry about.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Ungehobelter Hyuran-)Kein Grund zur Hektik! Da bin ich doch.

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Serious Hyuran Male-)You summoned?
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Ernster Hyuran-)Du hast gerufen?

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Carefree Hyuran Male-)Yes? <sigh> I hope this doesn't take long...
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Sorgloser Hyuran-)Ja, bitte? <seufz> Ich hoffe, das dauert nicht allzu lang ...

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Independent Hyuran Male-)You wish to see how a master handles a bazaar?
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Eigenwilliger Hyuran-)Du möchtest sehen, wie ein Meister die Märkte im Griff hat?

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE6<tab>(-Lively Hyuran Male-)Hello, hello! You called?
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE6<tab>(-Lebhafter Hyuran-)Hallo, hallo! Du hast gerufen?

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Polite Hyuran Female-)At your service, my <var 08 E905 ((lady)) ((lord)) /var>.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Höfliche Hyuran-)Zu Diensten, <var 08 E905 ((meine Dame)) ((mein Herr)) /var>.

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Rough Hyuran Female-)What's it to be this time, love?
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Ungehobelte Hyuran-)Was gibt es diesmal, <var 08 E905 ((Süße)) ((Süßer)) /var>?

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Serious Hyuran Female-)What would you ask?
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Ernste Hyuran-)Was ist dein Begehr?

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Carefree Hyuran Female-)I'm so sorry to keep you waiting, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>. So very, very sorry.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Sorglose Hyuran-)Hab ich dich warten lassen? 'Tschuldigung.

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Independent Hyuran Female-)Quickly now, I've places to be.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Eigenwillige Hyuran-)Beeilung, ich hab noch andere Dinge zu erledigen.

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>(-Lively Hyuran Female-)Well, if it ain't my favorite client! Always a pleasure, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>!
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>(-Lebhafte Hyuran-)Wenn das nicht <var 08 E905 ((meine Lieblingsauftraggeberin)) ((mein Lieblingsauftraggeber)) /var> ist! Ist mir wie immer ein Vergnügen, <var 08 E905 ((meine Dame)) ((mein Herr)) /var>!

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Polite Elezen Male-)Yes, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>? What is your bidding?
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Höflicher Elezen-)Ja, <var 08 E905 ((meine Dame)) ((mein Herr)) /var>? Wie kann ich Euch behilflich sein?

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Rough Elezen Male-)What's on the agenda, chief? Deprivin' saps o' their hard-earned gil?
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Ungehobelter Elezen-)Was steht an, <var 08 E905 ((Chefin)) ((Boss)) /var>? Ein paar arme Tölpel um ihre schwer verdienten Gil bringen?

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Serious Elezen Male-)I have come. You may proceed.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Ernster Elezen-)Hier bin ich. Nennt Euer Begehr.

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Carefree Elezen Male-)Oh, hello there. To what do I owe the pleasure?
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Sorgloser Elezen-)Oh, hallo. Warum beehrt Ihr mich?

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Independent Elezen Male-)I am come to conduct business, and only business.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Eigenwilliger Elezen-)Ich bin geschäftlich hier, rein geschäftlich.

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE6<tab>(-Lively Elezen Male-)You look to be in good health, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>. How may I assist you this fine <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((eve)) ((morn)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((day)) ((eve)) /var>)) /var>?
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE6<tab>(-Lebhafter Elezen-)Ihr seht blendend aus, <var 08 E905 ((meine Dame)) ((mein Herr)) /var>. Wie kann ich Euch helfen?

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Polite Elezen Female-)What is it you would have me do, <var 08 E905 ((milady)) ((milord)) /var>?
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Höfliche Elezen-)Was möchtet Ihr mir auftragen, <var 08 E905 ((meine Dame)) ((mein Herr)) /var>?

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Rough Elezen Female-)Usually, it's me doin' the summons and others doin' the waitin'.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Ungehobelte Elezen-)Normalerweise rufe <var 1A 02 /var>ich<var 1A 01 /var> Leute herbei und lasse <var 1A 02 /var>andere<var 1A 01 /var> warten.

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Serious Elezen Female-)Is there something that I can help you with?
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Ernste Elezen-)Gibt es etwas, bei dem ich Euch helfen kann?

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Carefree Elezen Female-)Oh, why must you summon me at a time like this...?
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Sorglose Elezen-)Och nö, warum musst du mich zu solch einer Unzeit herbeirufen ...?

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Independent Elezen Female-)I'm sure there is a perfectly good explanation for this summons.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Eigenwillige Elezen-)Ich bin mir sicher, Ihr habt einen guten Grund für Euer Rufen.

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>(-Lively Elezen Female-)You know, I thought you might be along to summon me. You may rest assured that I am ready and eager to serve.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>(-Lebhafte Elezen-)He, ich wusste, dass Ihr mich rufen würdet. Seid versichert, dass für mich kein Auftrag zu schwer ist.

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Polite Lalafellin Male-)Hail to thee, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>. Your humble servant has heard your summons.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Höflicher Lalafell-)Seid gegrüßt, <var 08 E905 ((meine Dame)) ((mein Herr)) /var>. Euer treuer Diener hat Euer Rufen erhört.

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Rough Lalafellin Male-)Greetin's and salutations, <var 08 E905 ((milady)) ((milord)) /var>. Pray speak yer desires, an' I'll do me damndest to see 'em done.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Ungehobelter Lalafell-)Ja, bitte? Sag mir, was du willst, und ich werde sehen, was ich tun kann.

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Serious Lalafellin Male-)I was wondering when you'd get around to calling me.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Ernster Lalafell-)Ich habe mich schon gefragt, wann du mich rufen würdest.

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Carefree Lalafellin Male-)Mind if we keep this brief? I've got a pretty little thing that's waitin' for me.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Sorgloser Lalafell-)Können wir das kurz halten? Ich habe da noch etwas zu erledigen.

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Independent Lalafellin Male-)What?
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Eigenwilliger Lalafell-)Was willst du?

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE6<tab>(-Lively Lalafellin Male-)I'm here, I'm here!
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE6<tab>(-Lebhafter Lalafell-)Ich bin hier, ich bin hier!

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Polite Lalafellin Female-)Here I am, <var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var>, as per your request.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Höfliche Lalafell-)Hier bin ich, <var 08 E905 ((Meisterin)) ((Meister)) /var>. Stets zu Diensten.

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Rough Lalafellin Female-)'Ello, dearie. What's on the docket?
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Ungehobelte Lalafell-)He, <var 08 E905 ((Süße)) ((Süßer)) /var>. Was steht an?

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Serious Lalafellin Female-)I never miss a chance to line these pockets.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Ernste Lalafell-)Ich lasse mir keine Gelegenheit entgehen, mir die Taschen zu füllen.

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Carefree Lalafellin Female-)Well, this is unexpected! What'll it be?
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Sorglose Lalafell-)Nun, das kommt unerwartet! Was gibt's?

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Independent Lalafellin Female-)What is it now?
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Eigenwillige Lalafell-)Was ist denn nun schon wieder?

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>(-Lively Lalafellin Female-)Here I aaaaaam!
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>(-Lebhafte Lalafell-)Hier bin ich! Hallooo!

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Polite Miqo'te Male-)How may I be of serrrvice, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>?
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Höflicher Miqo'te-)Wie kann ich Euch zu Diensten sein, <var 08 E905 ((Frrräulein)) ((Herrrr)) /var>?

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Rough Miqo'te Male-)It's a war out there, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>. You have no idea.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Ungehobelter Miqo'te-)Da draußen ist Krieg, <var 08 E905 ((Mädel)) ((Junge)) /var>. Du hast ja keine Ahnung.

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Serious Miqo'te Male-)...
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Ernster Miqo'te-)... Was gibt es?

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Carefree Miqo'te Male-)Business or pleasure?
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Sorgloser Miqo'te-)Geschäftlich oder privat?

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Independent Miqo'te Male-)I presume you did not summon me solely for the pleasure of my company.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Eigenwilliger Miqo'te-)Ich nehme an, du hast mich nicht gerufen, weil dir langweilig ist.

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE6<tab>(-Lively Miqo'te Male-)Just the <var 08 E905 ((fair maiden)) ((handsome fellow)) /var> I was hoping to see! Tell me your heart's desire.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE6<tab>(-Lebhafter Miqo'te-)Genau <var 08 E905 ((die schöne junge Frau)) ((der hübsche junge Mann)) /var>, auf <var 08 E905 ((die)) ((den)) /var> ich gewartet habe! Was kann ich für dich tun?

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Polite Miqo'te Female-)I hope your catcall is not one of disapproval.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Höfliche Miqo'te-)Ich hoffe, ich werde Euch zufriedenstellen können.

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Rough Miqo'te Female-)Ye rang, <var 08 E905 ((milady)) ((milord)) /var>?
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Ungehobelte Miqo'te-)Du hast gerufen, <var 08 E905 ((Mädchen)) ((Junge)) /var>?

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Serious Miqo'te Female-)A cat's ears do not miss much―least of all a summons.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Ernste Miqo'te-)Meinen Katzenohren entgeht nichts - schon gar nicht dein Rufen.

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Carefree Miqo'te Female-)Curiosity called the cat. What do you have for me today?
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Sorglose Miqo'te-)Die Neugier ruft die Katze herbei. Was kann ich heute für dich tun?

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Independent Miqo'te Female-)Ready when you are.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Eigenwillige Miqo'te-)Ich wär so weit.

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>(-Lively Miqo'te Female-)I was just thinking of you!
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>(-Lebhafte Miqo'te-)He, ich habe gerade an dich gedacht!

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Polite Roegadyn Male-)What need have you of me today, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>?
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Höflicher Roegadyn-)Welches Anliegen habt Ihr heute, <var 08 E905 ((meine Dame)) ((mein Herr)) /var>?

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Rough Roegadyn Male-)Bwahahaha! Ye got work needs gettin' done? Just point me in the right bloody direction.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Ungehobelter Roegadyn-)Harhar! Du hast was zu erledigen? Spuck's nur aus.

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Serious Roegadyn Male-)I've come. What is it?
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Ernster Roegadyn-)Da bin ich. Was liegt an?

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Carefree Roegadyn Male-)Hey there─hic─<var 08 E905 ((missy)) ((mate)) /var>! Care to join me fer a pint?
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Sorgloser Roegadyn-)Hallo ... <hicks> ... <var 08 E905 ((Kleines)) ((mein Freund)) /var>! Trinken wir einen zusammen?

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Independent Roegadyn Male-)Couldn't come no quicker. Where's the work?
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Eigenwilliger Roegadyn-)Schneller konnte ich nicht kommen. Gibt's Arbeit?

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE6<tab>(-Lively Roegadyn Male-)I came runnin' soon as I heard the bell! Ye need somethin', chief?
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE6<tab>(-Lebhafter Roegadyn-)Ich bin sofort losgerannt, als ich die Glocke hörte! Brauchst du etwas?

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Polite Roegadyn Female-)I am at your disposal, <var 08 E905 ((milady)) ((milord)) /var>.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Höfliche Roegadyn-)Ich stehe Euch zu Diensten, <var 08 E905 ((meine Dame)) ((mein Herr)) /var>.

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Rough Roegadyn Female-)Ye got somethin' fer me, cap'n?
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Ungehobelte Roegadyn-)Hast du was für mich, Käpt'n?

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Serious Roegadyn Female-)Go ahead, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Ernste Roegadyn-)Melde mich zum Dienst, <var 08 E905 ((meine Dame)) ((mein Herr)) /var>.

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Carefree Roegadyn Female-)Let's keep this short and sweet, shall we?
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Sorglose Roegadyn-)Lass uns die Sache schnell erledigen, ja?

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Independent Roegadyn Female-)This wouldn't be necessary if you entrusted your financial affairs to me.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Eigenwillige Roegadyn-)Das wäre nicht nötig, wenn du deine Finanzen <var 1A 02 /var>mir<var 1A 01 /var> überlassen würdest.

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>(-Lively Roegadyn Female-)So─sellin', buyin', drinkin', whorin'? What's it to be today?
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>(-Lebhafte Roegadyn-)Also ... verkaufen, kaufen, trinken? Was steht heute an?

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_AURA_MALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Polite Auri Male-)Greetings, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>. How may I be of service?
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_AURA_MALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Höflicher Au Ra-)Wie kann ich Euch zu Diensten sein, <var 08 E905 ((Meisterin)) ((Meister)) /var>?

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_AURA_MALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Rough Auri Male-)What'll it be, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((mate)) /var>?
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_AURA_MALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Ungehobelter Au Ra-)Sag, was Sache ist, dann bin ich wieder weg.

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_AURA_MALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Serious Auri Male-)State your business.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_AURA_MALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Ernster Au Ra-)Kann ich etwas für Euch erledigen, <var 08 E905 ((meine Dame)) ((mein Herr)) /var>?

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_AURA_MALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Carefree Auri Male-)And how does this wonderful <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((evening)) ((day)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((day)) ((evening)) /var>)) /var> find you?
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_AURA_MALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Sorgloser Au Ra-)Schöner Tag heute, nicht wahr? Perfekt für eine Unternehmung.

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_AURA_MALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Independent Auri Male-)Well... Here I am...<var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var>.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_AURA_MALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Eigenwilliger Au Ra-)Was ist denn nun schon wieder? Ich wollte mir gerade einen Becher Reiswein einschenken ...

source:
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_AURA_MALE_TYPE6(-Lively Auri Male-)We work the market stalls,♪
And our uniforms are pretty;♪
We are sober men and true,♪
And attentive to our duties!♪
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_AURA_MALE_TYPE6<tab>(-Lebhafter Au Ra-)Schön, Euch zu sehen! Was liegt an?

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Polite Auri Female-)<var 08 E905 ((My lady)) ((My lord)) /var>. What would you ask of me?
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Höfliche Au Ra-)Wie kann ich Euch zu Diensten sein, <var 08 E905 ((Meisterin)) ((Meister)) /var>?

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Rough Auri Female-)So. We doing this?
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Ungehobelte Au Ra-)Fass dich kurz, ich hab schon genug um die Ohren.

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Serious Auri Female-)Yes?
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Ernste Au Ra-)Bitte, sprecht. Was habt Ihr auf dem Herzen?

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Carefree Auri Female-)Hey, it's...it's you! Hello again, you!
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Sorglose Au Ra-)Hallöchen, was steht an, was steht an?

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Independent Auri Female-)I-It's not like I want to sell your items or anything.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Eigenwillige Au Ra-)Hab ich da was klingeln gehört?

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>(-Lively Auri Female-)What do you have for me? Come on, come on! Don't be shy!
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>(-Lebhafte Au Ra-)Na, hast du mich vermisst, <var 08 E905 ((Kleine)) ((Kleiner)) /var>?

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Polite Hrothgar Male-)You rang, <var 08 E905 ((milady)) ((milord)) /var>?
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Höflicher Hrothgar-)Stets zu Diensten, <var 08 E905 ((Meisterin)) ((Meister)) /var>. Was liegt Euch auf dem Herzen?

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Rough Hrothgar Male-)I trust this will be worth my while.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Ungehobelter Hrothgar-)Was willst du von mir? Bild dir nicht ein, dass ich dir den Diener mach, <var 08 E905 ((Kleine)) ((Kleiner)) /var>.

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Serious Hrothgar Male-)<var 1A 02 /var>What<var 1A 01 /var>?
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Ernster Hrothgar-)Oh, ein Auftrag<var 1D /var>...<var 1D /var>? Ich hoffe, es is wichtig.

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Carefree Hrothgar Male-)Whatever you need, leave it to me! I have my methods.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Sorgloser Hrothgar-)Also dann, <var 08 E905 ((Frau Abenteurerin)) ((Herr Abenteurer)) /var>. Was kann ich denn für dich tun?

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Independent Hrothgar Male-)Gahaha! If it isn't my favorite <var 08 E905 ((mistress)) ((master)) /var>!
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Eigenwilliger Hrothgar-)Hm, was? Hast du nach mir gerufen? Hätte ich fast nicht mitbekommen.

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE6<tab>(-Lively Hrothgar Male-)It is I, your most loyal and capable retainer!
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE6<tab>(-Lebhafter Hrothgar-)Grrrahaha! Na, spuck schon aus, was steht an?

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Polite Viera Female-)What will it be, love?
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Höfliche Viera-)Na, Herzchen? Was darf ich denn heute für dich tun, hm?

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Rough Viera Female-)Your orders! I would hear them at once!
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Ungehobelte Viera-)Ein Auftrag? Bah, kannst du nicht jemand anderen fragen<var 1D /var>...?

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Serious Viera Female-)If there is something you would ask of me, then ask it.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Ernste Viera-)Zu Diensten. Bitte komm zur Sache, ich bin reichlich beschäftigt.

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Carefree Viera Female-)Yes...? Is there something you─<yawn>─need?
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Sorglose Viera-)Oh, ich wurde gerufen! Wie aufregend! Endlich ein bisschen Abwechslung.

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Independent Viera Female-)A task for me? I hope it's something fun!
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Eigenwillige Viera-)Ja ja, anwesend. Was gibt's?

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>(-Lively Viera Female-)I am here to do your every bidding, <var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var>! Ask of me anything at all!
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>(-Lebhafte Viera-)Ich?! O-Oh, ja, hier! Darf ich mich nützlich machen?

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_VIERA_MALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Polite Viera Male-)I have been awaiting your summons, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>. What would you have of me this fine <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((evening)) ((morning)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((day)) ((evening)) /var>)) /var>?
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_VIERA_MALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Höflicher Viera-)Ich hatte schon geahnt, dass du mich an diesem wundervollen <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((Abend)) ((Morgen)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((Tag)) ((Abend)) /var>)) /var> rufen würdest! Was kann ich für dich tun?

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_VIERA_MALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Rough Viera Male-)What can I do for ye, yer <var 08 E905 ((ladyship)) ((lordship)) /var>?
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_VIERA_MALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Ungehobelter Viera-)<var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 (('n Abend)) ((Moin)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((Tach)) (('n Abend)) /var>)) /var>, <var 08 E905 ((Meisterin)) ((Meister)) /var>. Was gibt's?

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_VIERA_MALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Serious Viera Male-)You called, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>...?
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_VIERA_MALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Ernster Viera-)Ihr verlangt nach mir, <var 08 E905 ((Meisterin)) ((Meister)) /var>?

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_VIERA_MALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Carefree Viera Male-)You─hic─rang?
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_VIERA_MALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Sorgloser Viera-)War das grad - <hick> - die Klingel?

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_VIERA_MALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Independent Viera Male-)Need my assistance, do you? Let's make this quick, then.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_VIERA_MALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Eigenwilliger Viera-)Du hast mich gerufen? Also gut. Wie lautet der nächste Auftrag?

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_VIERA_MALE_TYPE6<tab>(-Lively Viera Male-)You have my ear, <var 08 E905 ((milady)) ((milord)) /var>. Both of them, in fact!
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_ENTER_VIERA_MALE_TYPE6<tab>(-Lebhafter Viera-)Ich bin ganz Ohr, <var 08 E905 ((meine treueste Dame)) ((mein treuster Herr)) /var>. Dein Wunsch ist mir Befehl!

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Polite Hyuran Male-)If that is all, I will take my leave now, <var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var>.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Höflicher Hyuran-)Wenn das alles ist, werde ich mich nun verabschieden, <var 08 E905 ((Meisterin)) ((Meister)) /var>.

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Rough Hyuran Male-)Take care o' yerself, hear?
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Ungehobelter Hyuran-)Ich soll auf mich aufpassen? Wer bist du, meine Mutter?

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Serious Hyuran Male-)Until we next meet.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Ernster Hyuran-)Bis zum nächsten Mal.

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Carefree Hyuran Male-)Well, it's about time. Good-bye.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Sorgloser Hyuran-)Nun, wurde ja auch Zeit. Wieder<var 16 /var>sehen!

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Independent Hyuran Male-)I believe thanks are in order.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Eigenwilliger Hyuran-)Ich denke, ein Dank wäre angebracht.

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE6<tab>(-Lively Hyuran Male-)I'm off, then!
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_HYURAN_MALE_TYPE6<tab>(-Lebhafter Hyuran-)Ich geh dann mal!

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Polite Hyuran Female-)With your leave, my <var 08 E905 ((lady)) ((lord)) /var>.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Höfliche Hyuran-)Mit Eurer Erlaubnis, <var 08 E905 ((meine Dame)) ((mein Herr)) /var>.

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Rough Hyuran Female-)Don't you worry 'bout a thing. I got this.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Ungehobelte Hyuran-)Mach dir keinen Kopf. Ich regel das.

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Serious Hyuran Female-)Farewell, then.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Ernste Hyuran-)Leb wohl.

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Carefree Hyuran Female-)If there is nothing else, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>, I'll be going now.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Sorglose Hyuran-)Wenn sonst nichts anliegt, breche ich dann mal auf.

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Independent Hyuran Female-)Is that all? Very well, until next time.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Eigenwillige Hyuran-)Ist das alles? Gut, dann bis zum nächsten Mal.

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>(-Lively Hyuran Female-)Oh, will that be all today? Very well, but promise me you'll come back soon!
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_HYURAN_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>(-Lebhafte Hyuran-)Oh, war's das für heute? Nun, versprich mir, bald wiederzukommen!

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Polite Elezen Male-)As always, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>, it has been an honor and a privilege.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Höflicher Elezen-)Es war mir wie immer eine Ehre und ein Vergnügen, <var 08 E905 ((meine Dame)) ((mein Herr)) /var>.

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Rough Elezen Male-)You can count on me, chief─I know how to get things done.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Ungehobelter Elezen-)Du kannst auf mich zählen, <var 08 E905 ((Chefin)) ((Boss)) /var> - ich weiß, wie der Hase hier läuft.

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Serious Elezen Male-)Don't be a stranger.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Ernster Elezen-)Meldet Euch mal wieder.

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Carefree Elezen Male-)I swear it shall be done. Eventually.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Sorgloser Elezen-)Ich schwöre, ich werd's erledigen. Irgendwann mal.

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Independent Elezen Male-)As you wish.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Eigenwilliger Elezen-)Wie Ihr wünscht.

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE6<tab>(-Lively Elezen Male-)Capital! I shall carry out your orders forthwith.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ELEZEN_MALE_TYPE6<tab>(-Lebhafter Elezen-)Großartig! Ich werde mich sofort drum kümmern.

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Polite Elezen Female-)I humbly await your next summons, <var 08 E905 ((milady)) ((milord)) /var>.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Höfliche Elezen-)Ich werde auf Euer nächstes Rufen warten, <var 08 E905 ((meine Dame)) ((mein Herr)) /var>.

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Rough Elezen Female-)Don't leave me alone for too long, hear?
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Ungehobelte Elezen-)Lass mich nicht zu lang allein, hörst du?

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Serious Elezen Female-)Always a pleasure.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Ernste Elezen-)War mir wie immer ein Vergnügen.

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Carefree Elezen Female-)That will be all, yes? Then if you would excuse me...
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Sorglose Elezen-)Das wäre alles? Wenn du mich dann entschuldigen würdest ...

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Independent Elezen Female-)I believe that concludes our dealings for now.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Eigenwillige Elezen-)Ich denke, damit ist unser Handel fürs Erste erledigt.

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>(-Lively Elezen Female-)Are you certain you don't desire anything else? Anything at all? Very well, I shall take my leave.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ELEZEN_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>(-Lebhafte Elezen-)Seid Ihr sicher, dass Ihr sonst nichts braucht? Wirklich? Gut, mit Verlaub ...

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Polite Lalafellin Male-)Your every whim shall be swiftly carried out with due care and consideration.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Höflicher Lalafell-)Eure Anliegen werden zügig und mit größter Sorgfalt erledigt.

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Rough Lalafellin Male-)Shouldn't take more than a moment, <var 08 E905 ((milady)) ((milord)) /var>.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Ungehobelter Lalafell-)Ich geh dann mal.

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Serious Lalafellin Male-)I'll be going, then.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Ernster Lalafell-)Sollte nicht lange dauern, <var 08 E905 ((Chefin)) ((Boss)) /var>.

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Carefree Lalafellin Male-)Thank the gods we're finished. I've got plans to put my hands in places I've never seen...if you know what I mean.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Sorgloser Lalafell-)Den Göttern sei Dank, dass wir hier fertig sind. Ich hab noch so einiges zu erledigen ...

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Independent Lalafellin Male-)Be well.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Eigenwilliger Lalafell-)Mach's gut.

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE6<tab>(-Lively Lalafellin Male-)I'm off, I'm off!
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_LALAFELL_MALE_TYPE6<tab>(-Lebhafter Lalafell-)Ich bin dann mal weg, tschüssi!

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Polite Lalafellin Female-)Until we meet again!
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Höfliche Lalafell-)Einen schönen Tag wünsche ich Euch noch.

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Rough Lalafellin Female-)Blessin's o' the Twelve upon ye.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Ungehobelte Lalafell-)Möge Nald'thal unsere Taschen mit klingender Münze füllen!

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Serious Lalafellin Female-)May Nald'thal see fit to fatten our pockets!
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Ernste Lalafell-)Der Segen der Zwölf sei mit dir.

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Carefree Lalafellin Female-)Very good, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>! Your wish is my command, and so forth.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Sorglose Lalafell-)Sehr gut! Dein Wunsch ist mir Befehl und so.

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Independent Lalafellin Female-)You know how to reach me.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Eigenwillige Lalafell-)Du weißt ja, wie du mich findest.

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>(-Lively Lalafellin Female-)Is it time for good-byes already? I'm going to miss you...
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_LALAFELL_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>(-Lebhafte Lalafell-)Oh, schon Zeit für den Abschied? Du wirst mir fehlen ...

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Polite Miqo'te Male-)Thy will be done.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Höflicher Miqo'te-)Ich werde Euer Anliegen umgehend erledigen.

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Rough Miqo'te Male-)The markets may be a bleedin' battlefield, but I'm a godsdamned soldier. You can count on me, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Ungehobelter Miqo'te-)Die Märkte sind ein verdammtes Schlachtfeld, aber ich bin ein Vollblutsoldat. Du kannst auf mich zählen.

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Serious Miqo'te Male-)...
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Ernster Miqo'te-)... Ich geh.

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Carefree Miqo'te Male-)Why so serrrious? <sigh> So it goes.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Sorgloser Miqo'te-)Warum denn so errrnst? <seufz> Dann mal los.

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Independent Miqo'te Male-)I hardly think that warranted my personal appearance, but what is done is done.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Eigenwilliger Miqo'te-)Dafür hätte es mich nicht gebraucht, aber nun ist es wohl zu spät.

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE6<tab>(-Lively Miqo'te Male-)Then I have satisfied your every need? Excellent! I do so take pleasure in servicing my clients.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_MIQOTE_MALE_TYPE6<tab>(-Lebhafter Miqo'te-)Dann bist du also zufrieden? Ausgezeichnet! Ich freue mich, dass ich dir helfen konnte.

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Polite Miqo'te Female-)Good-bye for now, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sirrr)) /var>.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Höfliche Miqo'te-)Auf Wieder<var 16 /var>sehen, Abenteurrrer<var 08 E905 ((in)) (()) /var>.

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Rough Miqo'te Female-)Right then, let's get on with it!
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Ungehobelte Miqo'te-)Alles klar, dann mal los!

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Serious Miqo'te Female-)There is no call for concerrrn.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Ernste Miqo'te-)Es gibt keinen Grund zur Sorrrge.

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Carefree Miqo'te Female-)When the master's away, the cat will play.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Sorglose Miqo'te-)Ist <var 08 E905 ((die Meisterin)) ((der Meister)) /var> aus dem Haus, tanzt die Katze auf dem Tisch.

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Independent Miqo'te Female-)Gods, this is tirin'...
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Eigenwillige Miqo'te-)Bei den Göttern, das ist ermüdend ...

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>(-Lively Miqo'te Female-)You don't want to be with me anymore? <sniffle>
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_MIQOTE_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>(-Lebhafte Miqo'te-)Du benötigst mich nicht mehr? <schnüff>

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Polite Roegadyn Male-)I shall carry out your wishes as instructed, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Höflicher Roegadyn-)Ich werde Eure Anweisungen genauestens befolgen, <var 08 E905 ((meine Dame)) ((mein Herr)) /var>.

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Rough Roegadyn Male-)Bwahahaha! I'm in yer bazaar, sellin' yer wares!
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Ungehobelter Roegadyn-)Harhar! Auf zum Markt, um die Sachen zu verscheuern!

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Serious Roegadyn Male-)I will go now.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Ernster Roegadyn-)Ich werde dann mal gehen.

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Carefree Roegadyn Male-)Awww, bugger. Reckon I best get to work...
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Sorgloser Roegadyn-)Och, schade. Ich mach mich dann wohl mal an die Arbeit ...

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Independent Roegadyn Male-)I don't do good-byes.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Eigenwilliger Roegadyn-)Ich mag keine Verabschiedungen.

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE6<tab>(-Lively Roegadyn Male-)Go and grab yourself some shut-eye, chief. You look terrible!
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ROEGADYN_MALE_TYPE6<tab>(-Lebhafter Roegadyn-)Gönn dir mal 'ne Mütze Schlaf, <var 08 E905 ((Chefin)) ((Boss)) /var>. Du siehst furchtbar aus!

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Polite Roegadyn Female-)Will that be all for today, <var 08 E905 ((milady)) ((milord)) /var>? Understood.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Höfliche Roegadyn-)Wäre das alles für heute, <var 08 E905 ((meine Dame)) ((mein Herr)) /var>? Dann ziehe ich mich zurück.

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Rough Roegadyn Female-)Aye, aye, cap'n!
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Ungehobelte Roegadyn-)Aye, aye, Käpt'n.

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Serious Roegadyn Female-)Duly noted.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Ernste Roegadyn-)Hab's notiert.

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Carefree Roegadyn Female-)Not exactly how I was hopin' to spend my day, but I suppose it can't be helped.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Sorglose Roegadyn-)Das hatte ich heute eigentlich nicht vor, aber es hilft wohl alles nicht.

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Independent Roegadyn Female-)Ours is not to reason why. Ours is but to do and die.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Eigenwillige Roegadyn-)Wir überlegen nicht lang, wir packen an.

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>(-Lively Roegadyn Female-)Ever the consummate professional, I see. Another time, then.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_ROEGADYN_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>(-Lebhafte Roegadyn-)Wie immer rein geschäftlich, wie ich sehe. Bis zum nächsten Mal dann.

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_AURA_MALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Polite Auri Male-)If there is nothing else, then I shall take my leave.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_AURA_MALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Höflicher Au Ra-)Dann werde ich mich nun zurückziehen. Mit Verlaub ...

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_AURA_MALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Rough Auri Male-)Is that all? Guess I'll be on my way, then.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_AURA_MALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Ungehobelter Au Ra-)Wenn's das alles war, verzieh ich mich mal wieder.

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_AURA_MALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Serious Auri Male-)Any last requests? Very well. Heh heh heh... Ahem.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_AURA_MALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Ernster Au Ra-)Es war mir eine Freude, Euch wiederzusehen.

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_AURA_MALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Carefree Auri Male-)Ah, yes, of course. Duty calls!
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_AURA_MALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Sorgloser Au Ra-)Dann flitz ich mal los.

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_AURA_MALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Independent Auri Male-)You are finished with me, then?
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_AURA_MALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Eigenwilliger Au Ra-)Wenn das mal gut geht ...

source:
TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_AURA_MALE_TYPE6(-Lively Auri Male-)Here today and gone tomorrow;♪
Yes, I know─♪
That is so!♪
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_AURA_MALE_TYPE6<tab>(-Lebhafter Au Ra-)Dann mal in die Hände gespuckt!

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Polite Auri Female-)If ever you have need of me, just ring.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Höfliche Au Ra-)Mit Eurer Erlaubnis ziehe ich mich zurück.

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Rough Auri Female-)Always a pleasure, <var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var>.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Ungehobelte Au Ra-)Und dafür breche ich mein Schönheitsbad ab? Ts ...

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Serious Auri Female-)Right, then.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Ernste Au Ra-)Ich wünsche noch einen schönen Tag.

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Carefree Auri Female-)Finished already? Guess that's that, then.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Sorglose Au Ra-)Gern geschehen. Bis dann!

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Independent Auri Female-)You're leaving already? Fine, then! I-It's not like I wanted you to stay or anything.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Eigenwillige Au Ra-)Ich geh dann mal ...

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>(-Lively Auri Female-)Very good, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>! Very good indeed!
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_AURA_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>(-Lebhafte Au Ra-)Bis zum nächsten Mal! <zwinker>

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Polite Hrothgar Male-)Always a pleasure to serve, <var 08 E905 ((milady)) ((milord)) /var>.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Höflicher Hrothgar-)Zögert nicht, jederzeit wieder nach mir zu rufen,  <var 08 E905 ((Meisterin)) ((Meister)) /var>.

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Rough Hrothgar Male-)Hmph. I hope that next time you will have a more meaningful task for me.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Ungehobelter Hrothgar-)... Dass ich dafür überhaupt aufgestanden bin. Nächstes Mal hast du hoffentlich was Spannenderes für mich, <var 08 E905 ((Kleine)) ((Kleiner)) /var>.

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Serious Hrothgar Male-)<var 1A 02 /var>Good-bye<var 1A 01 /var>.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Ernster Hrothgar-)Wenn das alles war, dann ziehe ich mich jetzt zurück.

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Carefree Hrothgar Male-)And with that, I shall be off. Places to go, people to see.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Sorgloser Hrothgar-)<var 08 E905 ((Frau Abenteurerin)) ((Herr Abenteurer)) /var>, man sieht sich. <zwinker>

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Indepedent Hrothgar Male-)Bahahaha! Till next time, my friend!
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Eigenwilliger Hrothgar-)Also dann<var 1D /var>... <gähn> Vielleicht reißt mich diese Klingel diesmal nicht aus meinen Träumen.

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE6<tab>(-Lively Hrothgar Male-)Ring for me whenever you please! You know that I will never let you down!
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_HROTHGAR_MALE_TYPE6<tab>(-Lebhafter Hrothgar-)Verstanden, verstanden. Lange kannst du ja sowieso nicht auf mich verzichten! Har!

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Polite Viera Female-)Must we part so soon?
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Höfliche Viera-)Nun denn, bis zum nächsten Mal, Herzchen.

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Rough Viera Female-)And I am off!
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Ungehobelte Viera-)Endlich fertig hier. Denk nicht mal dran, sofort wieder nach mir zu klingeln, hörst du?!

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Serious Viera Female-)Call on me as you please. If I am so inclined, I will answer.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Ernste Viera-)Ich ziehe mich zurück. Auf bald.

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Carefree Viera Female-)That is all, I suppose...? <yawn> Very well...
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Sorglose Viera-)Schon fertig hier? Na schön. Zögere nicht, nach mir zu rufen!

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Indepedent Viera Female-)That is all? Oh, I was hoping there'd be more...
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Eigenwillige Viera-)Kann ich jetzt gehen?

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>(-Lively Viera Female-)Is that all you need of me? But I could yet serve you in so many ways!
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_VIERA_FEMALE_TYPE6<tab>(-Lebhafte Viera-)<var 08 E905 ((Meisterin)) ((Meister)) /var>, ich bin immer hier, wenn Ihr mich braucht!

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_VIERA_MALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Polite Viera Male-)Do not hesitate to call upon me again. Fare you well in your endeavors, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_VIERA_MALE_TYPE1<tab>(-Höflicher Viera-)Zögere nicht, mich erneut zu rufen, wenn dir der Sinn danach steht. Und alles Gute auf deinen Abenteuern!

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_VIERA_MALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Rough Viera Male-)Just say the word, yer <var 08 E905 ((ladyship)) ((lordship)) /var>, and I'll be here with bells on.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_VIERA_MALE_TYPE2<tab>(-Ungehobelter Viera-)Ein Wort und ich bin zur Stelle, Eure Meisterlichkeit. Is' klar, ne?

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_VIERA_MALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Serious Viera Male-)If you have no further need of my services...
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_VIERA_MALE_TYPE3<tab>(-Ernster Viera-)Wenn das dann alles wäre<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_VIERA_MALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Carefree Viera Male-)I'm off for another glass, then. You know where to find me!
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_VIERA_MALE_TYPE4<tab>(-Sorgloser Viera-)Dann genehmige ich mir derweil noch ein Gläschen. Du weißt ja, wo du mich findest<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_VIERA_MALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Independent Viera Male-)What─is that it? Are you <var 1A 02 /var>sure<var 1A 01 /var> you need a retainer?
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_VIERA_MALE_TYPE5<tab>(-Eigenwilliger Viera-)Wie, das war's schon? Meinetwegen. Wenn du noch einen Auftrag hast, melde dich.

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_VIERA_MALE_TYPE6<tab>(-Lively Viera Male-)Nothing else? Then I shall be hopping along.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_LEAVE_VIERA_MALE_TYPE6<tab>(-Lebhafter Viera-)Nichts weiter, also? Wie bedauerlich. Dann hoppel' ich eben davon<var 1D /var>...

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_RETAINER_ORDER_FAILED_NO_CHARGE<tab>You cannot perform this action until you have purchased the services of an additional retainer.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_RETAINER_ORDER_FAILED_NO_CHARGE<tab>Du kannst keinen weiteren Gehilfen anstellen, weil der Vertrag ausgelaufen ist.

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_REMOVE_INVENTORY_EXPLANATION<tab>You cannot release retainers while they are in possession of any items or gil.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_REMOVE_INVENTORY_EXPLANATION<tab>Gehilfen können nur entlassen werden, nachdem du alle Gegenstände und Gil in dein Inventar zurückgenommen hast.

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_MAIN_MENU_EXPLANATION_01<tab>What would you like to know?
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_MAIN_MENU_EXPLANATION_01<tab>Mit welchen Auskünften kann ich dir behilflich sein?

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_RETAINER_REMOVE_FAILED<tab>You were unable to release that retainer.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_RETAINER_REMOVE_FAILED<tab>Der Gehilfe konnte nicht entlassen werden.

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_RETAINER_CREATE_FAILED<tab>Your application for a retainer was denied.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_RETAINER_CREATE_FAILED<tab>Der Gehilfe konnte nicht angestellt werden.

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_RETAINER_CALL_FAILED<tab>Your retainer could not be summoned.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_RETAINER_CALL_FAILED<tab>Der Gehilfe konnte nicht herbeigerufen werden.

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_REGISTER_MARKET_FAILED<tab>The retainer was unable to make the trip.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_REGISTER_MARKET_FAILED<tab>Der Gehilfe konnte nicht auf den Markt geschickt werden.

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_RETAINER_NAME_TOO_SHORT<tab>Nicknames must be between 3 and 20 characters.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_RETAINER_NAME_TOO_SHORT<tab>Der Name muss zwischen 3 und 20 Zeichen lang sein.

source: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_RETAINER_CONTRACT_ENDED<tab>This retainer's contract has been suspended.
target: TEXT_CMNDEFRETAINERDESK_00009_RETAINER_CONTRACT_ENDED<tab>Der Vertrag dieses Gehilfen ist abgelaufen.
